name: Plan Z - Organic Endomorph Body Type Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Protein-Packed Omelet: 3 organic egg whites, 1 organic whole egg, 1/4 cup organic cottage cheese, 1 cup organic spinach, 1/4 cup organic diced bell peppers, 1 slice organic whole grain toast
Breakfast.instructions: Make an omelet with eggs, cottage cheese, spinach, and bell peppers. Serve with whole grain toast.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt with Berries: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 1 tbsp organic ground flaxseed
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Mix yogurt with berries and sprinkle with flaxseed.

Lunch.details: Organic Lean Protein Bowl: 5 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1/2 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic mixed green salad, 1/4 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic balsamic vinaigrette
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken. Serve over quinoa and salad. Top with avocado and dress with vinaigrette.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Apple with Almond Butter: 1 organic apple, 1 tbsp organic almond butter
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Slice apple and serve with almond butter.

Post-Workout Shake.details: Organic Protein Recovery Shake: 1 scoop organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic unsweetened almond milk, 1/2 organic banana, 1 cup organic spinach

Dinner.details: Organic Baked Fish with Vegetables: 6 oz organic baked cod, 1 cup organic roasted Brussels sprouts, 1/2 cup organic roasted sweet potato, 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 organic lemon
Dinner.instructions: Bake cod. Roast Brussels sprouts and sweet potato. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Casein Protein Pudding: 1 scoop organic casein protein powder, 1/2 cup organic unsweetened almond milk, 1 tbsp organic cocoa powder, 1 tsp organic stevia
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix all ingredients to form a pudding consistency. Refrigerate before eating.
